price: 22 Moïse implora son Seigneur : « Voilà un peuple impie ! »
arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ مُّجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fadaʿā rabbahu anna hāulāi qawmun muj'rimūna
